name: Space Elemental
description:
In Space Elemental you have to shoot enemies with bullets to change their element. If enemies with the right element collide, they will be destroyed or changed.

 

Controls: 

  • WASD: Movement
  • Mouse: Aiming, Changing Element, Shooting
  • Escape: Quit
  • Space: Start, Restart

 

Element Reactions:

  • Ice destroys Rock
  • Ice destroys Fire
  • Rock destroys Electricity
  • Fire turns ice into Water
  • Fire evaporates Water to Steam
  • Electricity destroys Water
  • Water destroys Fire
  • Water destroys Rock

   

Combos:

  • Electricity turns Steam into Lightning, which destroys nearby enemies 
  • Fire turns Rock into Magma, which spreads a bit and destroys enemies
